org.jclouds.rackspace.cloudloadbalancers.v1

Interface CloudLoadBalancersApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface CloudLoadBalancersApi
extends Closeable
    Provides access to Rackspace Cloud Load Balancers.

    Author:
    Everett Toews
